code: function UrlParams(param){var query=window.location.href;var vars=query.split("&");for(var i=0;i<vars.length;i++){if(i==0){var first=vars[i].split("?");if(first[1]==undefined){return false;}var pair=first[1].split("=");}else{var pair=vars[i].split("=");}if(pair[0]==param){return pair[1];}}}export{UrlParams};
